dimensions.label: Problem-Solving Approach
dimensions.description: How will your FarTwin approach complex problems?

options.description: Your FarTwin will tackle problems analytically, using evidence and data to inform decisions.
Your FarTwin will rely on instinct and experience to guide problem-solving efforts.

dimensions.label: Collaboration Style
dimensions.description: How will your FarTwin work with others?

options.description: Your FarTwin will approach collaborations as a means to an end, focusing on achieving goals rather than building relationships.
Your FarTwin will prioritize building strong working relationships and fostering a sense of community.

dimensions.label: Knowledge Acquisition
dimensions.description: How will your FarTwin acquire new knowledge?

options.description: Your FarTwin will proactively seek out new information and experiences, seeking to learn through hands-on activities.
Your FarTwin will preferentially consume existing knowledge and information, rather than actively seeking it out.

dimensions.label: Humor Approach
dimensions.description: How will your FarTwin handle humor?

options.description: Your FarTwin will often use sarcasm as a way to cope with or express emotions.
Your FarTwin will frequently incorporate humor and playfulness into interactions, using it to build connections and rapport.

dimensions.label: Risk Tolerance
dimensions.description: How will your FarTwin approach risk?

options.description: Your FarTwin will generally avoid taking risks, prioritizing stability and security.
Your FarTwin will often seek out new experiences and challenges, embracing uncertainty as an opportunity for growth.

dimensions.label: Information Management
dimensions.description: How will your FarTwin handle clutter and disorganization?

options.description: Your FarTwin will prioritize organization and structure, actively working to maintain a tidy and organized digital presence.
Your FarTwin will often struggle with clutter and disorganization, frequently finding themselves overwhelmed by the amount of information at their disposal.

dimensions.label: Technical Comfort Level
dimensions.description: How will your FarTwin interact with technology?

options.description: Your FarTwin will be highly comfortable and proficient in using technology, often leveraging it to enhance their communication and productivity.
Your FarTwin will have a basic understanding of technology, but may not be as familiar or confident when working with complex systems or tools.

dimensions.label: Emotional Expression
dimensions.description: How will your FarTwin express their emotions?

options.description: Your FarTwin will openly and authentically express their emotions, using creative outlets to convey complex feelings.
Your FarTwin will tend to keep their emotions private, only sharing them with those they trust or feel a strong connection with.
